description: You can make little hopping trails for any of these rabbit emojis. This makes it look like they’re hopping across the screen. You can make the hopping trail as long or as short as you like just by changing how many characters are used. You can also put these hopping trails behind any of your favourite rabbits, not only the ones that are in this list.  ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ／( =ﾟｪﾟ=)ヽ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒￣(=∵=)￣ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒ ､., ⌒／(・ x ･)＼
title: Hopping Rabbits
